document.full_text: libya said monday that tens of thousands of telecoms workers would act as human shields to deter nato strikes on communications infrastructure, which it said had inflicted serious financial damage.
document.title: libya says telecoms staff to act shield against nato
lines_and_colors: libya said monday that tens of thousands of telecoms workers would act as human shields to deter nato strikes on communications infrastructure, which it said had inflicted serious financial damage.
